fixed_price_desc: Sell your NFT for a specific price.
auction_desc: Bids between start and end time.
price_hint: The price the buyer will pay.
start_time_hint: Your listing will begin on this date.
min_price_hint: The lowest acceptable bid to start the auction.
qty_hint: Number of tokens to sell (1 for NFTs).
buy_now_hint: Bidders can purchase instantly at this price.
confirm_terms: I confirm I own this item and agree to the marketplace terms.
wallet_sign_hint: This action will open your wallet to sign the transaction.
fees_hint: Marketplace fees and royalties are calculated at the time of sale.
no_nft_selected: No NFT selected. Please go back to step 1.
